title.value: Гельминтозы крупного рогатого скота и меры борьбы с ними в условиях экологического прессинга
Helminthic infections of cattle and their control measures in the conditions of environmental pressure

organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine

person.name: Protasovitskaya, R.N., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: The monograph describes helminthic and other parasitic infections of animals, in particular - parasitic diseases of cattle. The book represents the materials for the study of helminthic infections of cattle on the territory of Belarusian Polesje, contaminated with radionuclides with different levels of radioactivity. The research analyzes the data on the species composition of helminths of cattle, evaluates the role of helminths' associations in host organism, presents the information about epizootology of major helminthic infections, analyzes the efficiency of new anti-parasitic drugs and their influence on the organisms of animals.
